Hostess, union to mediate

In a possible reprieve for Twinkies, a judge today asked Hostess Brands Inc. and its second largest union to try to resolve their differences. They are expected to start meeting tomorrow. (AP, 3:46 p.m.)

Man charged in crash that killed wife

Michael Rivard is facing a charge of motor vehicle homicide by negligent operation after a crash killed his wife and injured his son, prosecutors said. (Globe, 2:55 p.m.)
